headline: Why software stocks are getting crushed as AI casts 'shadow of uncertainty' over sector
summary: Software stocks plummeted after Microsoft posted quarterly results that showed Azure revenue growth slowing slightly.

headline: Datadog (DDOG) Prefers Organic Growth Over Large Acquisitions, Says Bernstein
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) ranks among the most promising QQQ stocks according to hedge funds. Bernstein reaffirmed its Outperform rating and $180 price target for Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) on January 23, citing market chatter about the possibility of a GitLab acquisition. Bernstein analyst Peter Weed expressed reservations about the arrangement, saying it “doesn’t make a lot of […]

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Turn Down
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Turn Down

headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Falls 9.94% as AI Threatens SaaS Sector
summary: We recently published 10 Stock Titans With Massive Losses. ServiceNow Inc. (NYSE:NOW) was one of the worst performers on Thursday. ServiceNow dropped for a third straight day on Thursday, shedding 9.94 percent to close at $116.73 apiece as investors turned cautious over the threats of AI for the broader software-as-a-service (SaaS) industry, overshadowing the company’s […]
